00001 <?php
00011 require_once $smarty->_get_plugin_filepath('shared','make_timestamp');
00031 function smarty_modifier_date_format($string, $format="%b %e, %Y", $default_date=null)
00032 {
00033     if (substr(PHP_OS,0,3) == 'WIN') {
00034            $_win_from = array ('%e',  '%T',       '%D');
00035            $_win_to   = array ('%#d', '%H:%M:%S', '%m/%d/%y');
00036            $format = str_replace($_win_from, $_win_to, $format);
00037     }
00038     if($string != '') {
00039         return strftime($format, smarty_make_timestamp($string));
00040     } elseif (isset($default_date) && $default_date != '') {
00041         return strftime($format, smarty_make_timestamp($default_date));
00042     } else {
00043         return;
00044     }
00045 }
